ygData.subject: Re: The Maximals are victorious!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ya We won Lunarpine said in a shrill voice as Smokescreen and Ramhorn began thier celebration, he d forgotten what it was like to celebrate victory. Wing

"Ya We won" Lunarpine said in a shrill voice as Smokescreen and 
Ramhorn began thier celebration, he'd forgotten what it was like to 
celebrate victory. "Wing you go get repaired, I'll wait out here."His 
internal repair system was already working overtime to fix his eyes, 
the pain he fealt was almost gone and the blurs he saw in front of 
him were slowly regaining shape.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zeus/Killer/Striker/Prowl/Ramulus/Ramhorn/Smokescreen::
> 
> Zeus nods, looking back at the battlefield to see if anyone was 
left behind. 
> Seeing Killer, he jumps forward, grabbing the Newcomer in his 
talons as he 
> flies off toward the Newcomer base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker looks on in surprise as the newcomers retreat. He blinks. 
They had 
> won! The Maximals had just fought back an almost full-scale assault 
from the 
> Newcomers singlehandedly, something that no other faction had done 
so far (to 
> his knowledge).
> 
> He smiles, looking over the battlefield, but seeing no dead 
bot. "Everyone, 
> grab a CR chamber, and get repaired!" he says into his comm-
link, "We have 
> won the day!"
> 
> With that, Striker heads to the Ark, keeping a lookout for any bots 
that 
> might need help.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl looks at the newcomers as they retreat. The Maximals have 
succsessfully 
> defended themselves! He looks over the battlefield, noting no 
casualties.
> 
> "Ok, see you then," he says into his comm-link, "The battle's over. 
We won!"
> 
> With that, Prowl heads to the equipment room on the Ark. His 
repairs could 
> wait, he still needed to come up with a plan to get Iron Raptor and 
Tavatron 
> out of the Alliance base, the least known base of the three main 
factions.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Ramulus smiles as Striker gives the command to get repaired. 
Repairs were 
> something that the ram could use. He headed toward the CR chambers.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Smokescreen and Ramhorn run up to Shadow Wing and Lunarpine.
> 
> "We won!' Smokescreen yells. He knew it was childish and silly to 
go crazy 
> over one victory, but it had been so many battles since the 
Maximals had last 
> won one, that this was almost signifying a new age for them.
